attributes.action: request that the Crown Prosecution Service instigate proceedings against all those involved in the transfer of the Queens powers to a foreign power/state(ie Brussels) As Prime Minister being the Queens first minister of State.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As people of the United Kingdom being loyal subjects to Her R.H.Queen Elisabeth 2. We have never given aurthority to anyone to pass powers that remove the powers the queen inherited. All parties engaged in the tranfer of power from the Soveriegn to a foreign state (Brussels)as under the masteric treaty be so charged as they are acting with out the will or aurthority of the people of the United Kingdom. All members of parliament on taking up their position swore an oath of allegiance to the Queen and Crown to serve it to the best of their ability.They were elected to carry out the wishes of the people of the United Kingdon,to put the people first. Not a Foreign Power,aurthority.

rejection.details: The Government cannot request that the CPS instigates criminal proceedings.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
